metadata.name: Burdens of Life
metadata.description:
This artwork is all about the hardships of life
There are so many ups and downs and we have to manage all the burden irrespective of being a girl or a boy everyone has a lot of weight on their shoulders.
 
This artwork is portrays how life can be colouful despite of the hurdles.

Colour scheme represents the beauty of life and the tree shows the beauty of burden.

It's a'' about being optimistic about the struggles.


Details -

Resolution - 2360 x 1640
DPI - 300
